content.title: PE Diagnosis
content.definition: CT pulmonary angiography is first-line. V/Q scan if CT contraindicated. D-dimer for low-probability patients.
content.statement: PE Diagnosis is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Dvt that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding PE Diagnosis helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of PE Diagnosis include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of PE Diagnosis.

citations.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
